text: tavada obagē deviyan (ovunṭa “mē venuven) oba (mā haṭa) kṛtagna vuvahot (mā magē varaprasādayan nævatat) obaṭa adhika kara dennemi. oba (magē varaprasādayanṭa kṛtagna novī) venaskam kaḷahot niyata vaśayenma magē dan̆ḍuvama itāmat daruṇu ekak vaśayen tikheṇu æta” yayi prakāśayaṭa pat kirīma yannada (nabiyē!) oba (movunṭa) matak kara denu
